fields.name: Ability:
fields.value: Visit a player at night to have them put in money to their 401k Plan.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: If they have an ability that has a limited charge, they lose a charge of that ability, but gain 2 charges at the end of the next night. You gain a charge of whatever ability they lost.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Give two people an extra charge. You do not need to be alive - you can die the night before completing your goal.
